PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2012-08262012-06-19TC,  ,  ,  ,  , 
ActCanada Marine Act
SubjectAmendments to increase the Hamilton Port Authority Borrowing Limit
PrecisOrder Amending the HAMILTON PORT AUTHORITY LETTERS PATENT in order to increase its borrowing limit, allowing the Hamilton Port Authority to grow and expand its business by investing in port infrastructure.
AttachmentsAttachment
